mapper.insert: insert into member (member_id, member_pw, member_nm, member_nicknm, member_st_cd, member_fl_cd, member_email, member_birth, member_gen, member_mile, member_tel, member_phone_vld, manager_cnfm_yn, member_like_fld, member_profile_nm, member_profile_path, ins_dt, udt_dt) values (#{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberNm}, #{memberNicknm}, #{memberStCd}, #{memberFlCd}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberGen}, #{memberMile}, #{memberTel}, #{memberPhoneVld}, #{managerCnfmYn}, #{memberLikeFld}, #{memberProfileNm}, #{memberProfilePath}, sysdate, sysdate)
